item.title: Oh Deer
item.description:
Title: Oh Deer
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie
Developer: Cozy Cabin Studios
Publisher: Cozy Cabin Studios
Release Date: Jun 27, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Mar 15, 2024




About This Game

Oh Deer is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game where one player plays as a hunter and up to four others play as deer.

Hunter Role

The hunter's role is to use sound, gadgets, and pure skill to locate and eliminate the other players before nightfall. However, knowing if the deer in your sights is a player or not is the true challenge.

Deer Role

The Deer's role is to hide from the hunter by blending in with a handful of AI deer scattered around the map. Eating food is a priority to keep hunger at bay. But improper timing when eating could mean the difference between life and death.

The Map

Forests are the perfect place to hide. With lots of trees, bushes, and cute flowers, deer can live happily for years without any worries. That is, until hunting season begins... Tall trees, thick bushes, and plenty of shade sets up a perfect ambush.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 or AMD 6700-XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection

item.title: Riven
item.description:
Title: Riven
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: Cyan Worlds Inc
Publisher: Cyan Worlds Inc
Franchise: Myst
Release Date: Jun 25, 2024




About This Game


“I know what he’s doing… He’s watching you.”

Travel to Riven , a beautiful and mysterious world on the verge of collapse. Explore this mysterious place, solve its puzzles, reveal its mysteries, make a daring rescue, and escape.

VISIT A MYSTERIOUS WORLD


“I am Gehn. I assume you’ve heard of me.”

Riven takes you on a journey through dense jungles, awe-inspiring caverns, and monolithic structures. Explore a world bent to the whims of a man who sees himself as a god and where every corner will immerse you in an otherworldly adventure.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN A SURREAL LANDSCAPE


“There’s a great deal of history that you should know…”

Riven rewards careful observation. Challenge Riven’s cunning puzzles, deftly woven throughout its narrative. The environment of Riven will reveal the story of this world as you make meaning from seemingly disparate bits of information and learn everything you need to know about this world.

UNRAVEL RIVEN’S SECRETS


“...it may be time to give this inexplicable mystery a second look.”

Who are the mysterious island dwellers you encounter during your exploration? What purpose does the giant golden dome serve? Why is this world on the verge of collapse? Play Riven and discover the answers to these mysteries- and more.

ABOUT THIS REMAKE


Created by the legendary indie developer Cyan Worlds and based on the smash-hit original released in 1997, Riven has been lovingly revisited by its key original visionaries to expand the epic narrative of the Myst universe.

Experience Riven like never before - with free movement through a real-time 3D environment. This brand-new, re-imagined, and expanded version of Riven offers a deeper story, new captivating visuals, and a journey that stays true to the original release while also expanding on Riven’s breathtaking world.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Figure Adventure
item.description:
Title: Figure Adventure
Genre: Action , Adventure , Massively Multiplayer , RPG , Simulation , Strategy , Free to Play
Developer: Figure Fantasy
Publisher: Figure Fantasy
Release Date: Jun 24, 2024




About This Game

Game gift package code:
SFLB666
XSLB888

Customer service email: wangquan0630@outlook.com
Join the community and receive a game gift pack
QQ chat group: 977486359
Discord: https://discord.gg/eUB7fw9qJS

Tips for changing the language:
Click to log in to the game--enter the game--click the gear in the upper right corner--scroll to the bottom--select the language type--exit the game and restart

[World View]
In secret corners that humans have never noticed, figures have never stopped performing their own secret stories.
The world of figures is small. They are always sad for their masters and happy for their masters. For them, their masters' feelings are everything.
The world of figures is big. When their masters are not around, they will jump out of the window together and travel in the human world.
Yuki, who exists as a figure, has always lived happily with his partners and his master in this way.
However, the emergence of the evil figure organization destroyed the peaceful and peaceful life of the figures. A large number of figures disappeared for no reason and were forced to separate from their masters. The dreams of the figures were shattered one after another. Yuki, who was involved in this incident, made unexpected discoveries in the process of investigating the evil figure organization in depth...
In the double difficult choice between the past and the present, what choice will Yuki make? Where will the fate of the figures involved in this chaos go?
"At the moment when the memory of love disappears, I just want to do my best to remember your name."

[Game Features]
"Figure Adventure" is a trendy game with the theme of hand-made figures, which integrates card cultivation and placement and hang-up gameplay!

Original and ingenious liver-nourishing and eye-brightening, exclusive owner-intertwined plot, massive hand-made backyard matching, enjoy the collection and interaction, and easy and strategic placement fun!

· New hand-made figures with rare paint ·
Hand-made skin sets and base growth system gameplay are open, hand-made figures can be dressed up as you like, and the backyard can be placed freely, saying goodbye to the stereotyped poster girl!

· New furniture, new backyard ·
Super rare bonus backyard furniture, free to receive in activities! Medieval castles, Chinese-style martial arts halls, and high-tech airships are waiting for you to place!

· Placement and hang-up, easy liver protection ·
Hand-made figures work, the owner wins! Easy hang-up, one-click to receive rich growth resources, stop playing and say goodbye to lengthy daily tasks!

· Blind box unboxing and figure collection ·
Carefully simulated unboxing experience, with Lolita, Shota, Queen, Mecha, and Tsundere Girls! Children only make choices, adults want them all!

· Strategic formations and maximum damage ·
High degree of freedom in formations, high strategic matching! Attack or steady defense, ignite or frost? It's all up to you!



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Revealing clothing and character portrait



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Window 10
    • Processor: ntel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Window 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 4 GB available space

item.title: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge
item.description:
Title: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Free to Play
Developer: WOMBEX Games
Publisher: WOMBEX Games
Release Date: Jun 24, 2024




About This Game

Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy the immersive 3D environments and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. Choose from different categories and solve all 31 puzzles on 5 difficulty settings for completely free or grab your favourite DLC.

Features

31 free puzzles
  • additional weekly puzzles and updates
  • 5 difficulties for each puzzle

2 free environments
  • Living Room


  • Cosy Bedroom


100 achievements
  • additional achievements for future puzzles will be added

10 relaxing music tracks

enhanced camera movement
  • find small details easily


made in Unreal Engine 5
  • cozy, realistic, colorful and immersive full 3D environments
  • real-time physics, powered by Chaos Physics
    • light-weight physics simulation solution used in Fortnite




AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Most of the pictures for the puzzles are AI-generated images.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: 6th Generation Intel i5 series (i5-6400) | AMD A10 series (A10-8750)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: 8th Generation Intel i5 series (i5-8400) | AMD Ryzen 5 PRO series (AMD Ryzen 5 PRO 1500)
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
